features: 32-fluid ounce bottle of Lubriderm Advanced Therapy Fragrance-Free Daily Moisturizing Lotion + Pro-Ceramide with Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 itchy, extra-dry skin to help strengthen skin’s moisture barrier

Specially designed unscented lotion intensely hydrates itchy, extra-dry skin. The soothing formula of the body lotion with Pro-Ceramide penetrates within skin's surface to deliver 48-hour clinically proven moisturization

Body lotion is formulated with vitamins E and Pro-Vitamin B5 which moisturizes to help strengthen skin's moisture barrier. The non-greasy lotion transforms itchy, extra-dry skin into healthier looking, more resilient skin
Clinically- and dermatologist-tested lotion is hypoallergenic and fragrance free. The daily hand and body moisturizer suitable for sensitive skin is formulated free of parabens, phthalates and dyes
Lubriderm, a dermatologist developed, advanced therapy lotion absorbs quickly and leaves a clean, non-greasy feel. To use, smooth on hands and body daily or as directed by a physician
body.description: Lubriderm Advanced Therapy Fragrance-Free Daily Moisturizing Lotion + Pro-Ceramide intensely hydrates and helps relieve itchy, extra-dry skin. From a dermatologist-developed brand, this fragrance-free moisturizing lotion provides 48-hour clinically proven hydration and helps strengthen skin's moisture barrier for more resilient skin. The soothing formula of this non-greasy lotion is suitable for sensitive skin and contains Pro-Vitamin B5 and Vitamin E to moisturize and transform itchy, dry skin into healthier-looking skin. The fast-absorbing formula of this hypoallergenic body lotion has been clinically, and dermatologist tested and is free of parabens, phthalates and dyes. To use, smooth on hands and body daily or as directed. Advanced Therapy Lotion + Pro-Ceramide for extra-dry skin from Lubriderm, a dermatologist developed brand.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Compare Our Products Advanced Therapy Lotion Daily Moisture Lotion Daily Moisture FF Lotion Intense Skin Repair Advanced Therapy Wash Daily Moisture Wash Skin Type Itchy, Extra-Dry Skin All Skin Types All Skin Types Rough, Dry Skin Itchy, Dry Skin All Skin Types Key Ingredients Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 Shea Butter and Glycerin Shea Butter and Glycerin Vitamin E and Minerals Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 Shea Butter Clinically Proven Hydration 48 Hours 24 Hours 24 Hours 48 Hours When Paired with Lotion When Paired with Lotion Pro-Ceramide Technology ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Suitable for Body + Face ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✘ ✔ Suitable for Sensitive Skin ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Hypoallergenic ✔ ✘ ✘ ✔ ✔ ✔ Allergy Tested ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Fragrance-Free ✔ ✘ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✘ Parabens, Phthalates and Dyes ✘ ✘ ✘ ✘ ✘ ✘

My bottle looks different, did Lubriderm change their packaging? Yes, you may have noticed that we have updated our packaging to showcase our new & improved formula with Pro-Ceramide. This exciting change reflects our commitment to delivering high-quality products. You may receive either design. Did Lubriderm change their formulas? Yes, Lubriderm has made some exciting changes to enhance our products! We have improved our formulas including the addition of Pro-Ceramide, but don’t worry-our lotions are still fast-absorbing with a clean, non-greasy feel. What is Pro-Ceramide and why is it important? Pro-Ceramide has been shown to penetrate within skin’s surface layers and help support your skin’s natural Ceramide levels. Ceramides play a role in helping maintain a healthy moisture barrier which helps retain moisture within your skin’s surface. Is Lubriderm lotion safe for use on tattoos? Experts recommend using a water-based lotion to hydrate tattooed skin. Lubriderm Daily Moisture Lotion Fragrance Free is a gentle, water-based, unscented lotion that quickly absorbs and moisturizes for healthy-looking skin. Which Lubriderm lotion is best for winter skin? Dry, winter air coupled with heat indoors can lead to very dry skin. Intensely moisturizing products such as Lubriderm Advanced Therapy Moisturizing Cream Fragrance-Free replenish extra dry skin and help to restore your skin's moisture barrier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the price
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is wonderful for really dry skin. It goes on smoothly, soaks right in, is not greasy, and doesn't have a scent so it doesn't compete with perfume or shampoo. It's highly effective and a great value for the price. It comes in a handy pump bottle and is nice and thick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We love this lotion in our household! I personally have been using it for years and so has my other half, even before I met him. It’s great for sensitive skin, I haven’t had any reactions. It’s moisturizing, quick drying, fragrant free and non creasy. Also a great lotion for tattoos. Highly recommend! This was also a great price for the size, cheaper than Walmart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product, excellent price
reviews.reviewText: This is a great body lotion, and I use it all the time. Truly scent free, which is important to me because I use a scented body wash and don't want a lotion that will conflict with that. The only thing I don't like is when I travel, I have to fill a small travel size bottle with this lotion. I wish it came with a small size as a freebie, but will deal with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and smooth
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased this Lubriderm moisturizer and I have to say, I'm absolutely in love with it! One of the best features of this moisturizer is how well it keeps my skin hydrated and glowing. Even after a long day, my skin still looks and feels soft and supple thanks to this product.What I appreciate most about this moisturizer is the fact that it's fragrance-free. I can apply it to my skin without worrying about any scent interfering with my perfume, and it's also gentle enough to use on my sensitive skin without any irritation.The formula itself is lightweight and absorbs quickly into my skin, so I never feel greasy or weighed down after applying it. Plus, a little goes a long way, so this bottle lasts me for quite some time.Overall, I highly recommend this Lubriderm moisturizer to anyone looking for a high-quality product that keeps skin hydrated and healthy. Its fragrance-free formula is a standout feature, and the lightweight formula makes it easy to use on a daily basis. Thanks to this moisturizer, my skin has never looked or felt better!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Helps during the dry winter months
reviews.reviewText: Nice light scent. My skin doesn't look scaly after using this lotion. However, this stuff is very thick and is hard to rub in. It's like putting the white paste we used in elementary school in the 60's on your skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Lotion on the market!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this for several years. I love that it has no scent. It does the job. I put it on and the next morning when I shower, I can still feel it on my skin. I use it from NECK down to my feet daily, as I have REALLY dry skin. Very nice product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly the best moisturizer for dry, sensitive skin.
reviews.reviewText: I have very dry, sensitive skin, especially in wintertime and Lubriderm has been the answer for me. Creamy, rich and absorbs quickly. A bit pricey compared to other brands, but definitely worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent lotion for aging, dry skin.
reviews.reviewText: Ii use this daily for my drying and thinning skin. It helps me eliminate itching, and wear and tear from the skin being less moist and easily damaged.
